stocks.impact_theory: Keysight reported Q1 2026 earnings with revenue of $1.60B (up 23% YoY) beating estimates, driven by AI data center infrastructure demand and next-gen connectivity testing. Economic implications include sustained AI capex cycle boosting test equipment makers. Market psychology shifts from AI disruption fears to infrastructure enablers. Historical parallel: 2020-2021 semis test firms like KEYS surged with chip boom. Analogies: 1) Fuel pump for AI engine - without precise testing, AI hardware fails; 2) Like quality control in auto manufacturing scaling with EV boom.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Earnings beat largest in 6 quarters, raised FY guidance; X sentiment positive on AI pivot (posts highlight customer doubling); web news confirms 18% surge on AI validation amid market rebound.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long for +10-20% gains to $195+ in 1-2 weeks on momentum.
potential_profit_risks.short_position: Short below $160 for -5-8% if tariff fears weigh on tech.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Macro tariff escalation hitting capex, overbought RSI, peer competition.

stocks.justification: Clear earnings catalyst with AI tailwinds, high volume confirmation, analyst upgrades.

stocks.impact_theory: Q4 earnings beat but Q1 guidance $600-625M missed due to $65M regulatory hit from FDA/SEC probe on compounded GLP-1 drugs. Economic: Regulatory clampdown curtails high-margin telehealth growth. Psychology: Fear of fines/legal overhang erodes premium valuation. Parallels: 2022 telehealth stocks like TDOC plunged on reimbursement cuts. Analogies: 1) Speeding ticket for fast-growing car - growth intact but fines slow it; 2) Like Uber facing city regs in expansion phase.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Guidance miss + SEC disclosure triggered selloff; X mixed (some recovery talk but bearish on fundamentals); web emphasizes regulatory risk overshadowing long-term vision.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long dip to $12 for rebound if resolution, +15% to $16.
potential_profit_risks.short_position: Short for -10-15% to $12 on probe escalation.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Unexpected favorable FDA outcome, subscriber growth beats.

stocks.justification: Strong volume on downside, but LT subscriber base resilient; probe details pending.

stocks.impact_theory: AMD announced $60B AI chip deal with Meta over 5 years (ships H2 2026), plus warrants for 160M shares (~10% stake). Economic: Validates AMD as Nvidia alternative in AI GPU race. Psychology: Reduces Nvidia monopoly fears, boosts semis rebound. Parallels: 2023 MSFT-AMD cloud deal sparked rally. Analogies: 1) Backup quarterback proving value in playoffs; 2) Like Intel-Amazon in early cloud shift.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Multi-year mega-deal amid AI capex surge; X buzzing (top traded, Meta/OpenAI ownership); news hails as major validation post-Monday selloff.

potential_profit_risks.short_position: Avoid, or below $155 for tariff pullback.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Nvidia earnings crush, tariff on imports, execution delays.

stocks.justification: Hyperscaler commitment locks revenue, X/high engagement confirms sentiment shift.

stocks.impact_theory: Vir announced Astellas collaboration + positive Phase 1 prostate cancer data (14/17 responses). Economic: Biotech M&A wave in oncology. Psychology: Catalyst unlocks pipeline value post-COVID setbacks. Parallels: 2021 BIIB Alz data spikes. Analogies: 1) Hidden gem in biotech chest; 2) Like lottery ticket hitting jackpot on trial readout.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Premarket +58%, new 52w high; X/analyst cheers (Needham PT $18); news on deal/data drives frenzy.

potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Trial dilution, biotech volatility, partnership terms.

stocks.justification: Explosive move but biotech prone to reversals; data solid but early stage.

stocks.impact_theory: Q4 2025 earnings: beat on cash flow, debt reduction, exploring LS&H sale; AI investments. Economic: Data analytics steady amid tech rebound. Psychology: Relief on balance sheet fixes. Parallels: Post-spin restructurings like 2022. Analogies: 1) Cleaning garage before sale; 2) Like trimming fat for marathon run.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Gap up post-earnings; X sentiment on AI/data; news highlights improvement despite loss.

potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Sale delays, continued losses, market rotation.

stocks.justification: Modest beat, low float volatility, but weak fundamentals.
